m_szDocTitle: Solar cells for the masses | Science! | Geek.com
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Solar cells for the masses Subscribing to a newsletter indicates your consent to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy . More Geek Eco-Cooler air conditioner cools a home without using electricity A new kind of solar cell is set to come to market and possibly revolutionize the use of solar power, or at least the amount of devices it can be used with. The company Konarka Technologies is currently testing a newly developed type of solar cell that is unlike those you commonly see used in calculators and on the sides of houses. These new cells come in flexible strips
